description: The genius of Germany, Killjoy secures and defends key battlefield positions with a collection of traps, turrets, and mines. Each invention is primed to punish any assailant too dumb to back down.

role.description: Sentinels are defensive experts who can lock down areas and watch flanks, both on attacker and defender rounds.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: EQUIP a Nanoswarm grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade. Upon landing, the Nanoswarm goes covert. ALT FIRE to lob. ACTIVATE the Nanoswarm to deploy a damaging swarm of nanobots.

abilities.name: ALARMBOT
abilities.description: EQUIP a covert Alarmbot. FIRE to deploy a bot that hunts down enemies that get in range.  After reaching its target, the bot explodes and applies Vulnerable to enemies in the area. HOLD EQUIP to recall a deployed bot.

abilities.name: TURRET
abilities.description: EQUIP a Turret. FIRE to deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180 degree cone. ALT FIRE to swap turret direction. HOLD EQUIP to recall the deployed turret.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: EQUIP the Lockdown device. FIRE to deploy the device. After a long windup, the device Detains all enemies caught in the radius. The device can be destroyed by enemies.
